name: Simple Syllogism - Socrates Mortality
description: Tests basic transitive inference with the classic Socrates syllogism

theory.natural_language: All humans are mortal. Socrates is a human.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes, Socrates is mortal because Socrates is a human and all humans are mortal.
expected_answer.explanation: Transitive: Socrates IS_A human, human IS_A mortal => Socrates IS_A mortal
